name: Reversinglabs TitaniumCloud
description: ReversingLabs TitaniumCloud is a threat intelligence solution which increases detection, analysis, and response efficiency by identifying files from queries to an authoritative 10 billion global goodware and malware database. A powerful set of REST API query and feed functions deliver targeted file and malware intelligence for threat identification, analysis, intelligence development, and threat hunting services

actions.description: Validate the asset configuration for connectivity using supplied configuration
TCA-0303 - Create a new YARA ruleset

ruleset_text.description: Stringified YARA ruleset / a Unicode string
ruleset_text.name: ruleset_text

actions.description: TCA-0303 - Delete YARA ruleset
TCA-0303 - Get YARA ruleset info
actions.verbose: Get information for a specific YARA ruleset or all YARA rulesets in the collection.

actions.description: TCA-0303 - Get YARA ruleset text
actions.verbose: Get the text of a YARA ruleset.

actions.description: TCA-0303 - Get a recordset of YARA ruleset matches in the specified time range
TCA-0319 - Enable YARA retro hunt
actions.verbose: Enable the retro hunt for the specified ruleset that has been submitted to TitaniumCloud prior to deployment of YARA retro.

actions.description: TCA-0319 - Start YARA retro hunt for the specified ruleset
TCA-0319 - Check the retro hunt status for the specified ruleset
TCA-0319 - Cancel the retro hunt for the specified ruleset
TCA-0319 - Get a recordset of YARA ruleset matches in the specified time range
TCA-0302 - Get a a list of all available SHA1 hashes for files sharing the same import hash (ImpHash)
actions.verbose: Imphash Index provides a list of all available SHA1 hashes for files sharing the same import hash (ImpHash). An ImpHash is a hash calculated from a string which contains the libraries imported by a Windows Portable Executable (PE) file.

actions.description: TCA-0320 - Search for hashes using multi-part search criteria
actions.verbose: Search for hashes using multi-part search criteria. Supported criteria include more than 60 keywords, 35 antivirus vendors, 137 sample types and subtypes, and 283 tags that enable creating 510 unique search expressions with support for Boolean operators and case-insensitive wildcard matching. A number of search keywords support relational operators '<=' and '>='.

actions.description: TCA-0103 - Retrieve AV Scanner data from TitaniumCloud
actions.verbose: Provides AV vendor cross-reference data for a desired sample from multiple AV scanners.

actions.description: TCA-0101 - Queries for file reputation info
TCA-0104 - Retrieve File Analysis by hash data from TitaniumCloud
actions.verbose: Provides file analysis data on hashes. Metadata can include relevant portions of static analysis, AV scan information, file sources and any related IP/domain information.

actions.description: TCA-0301 - Retrieve a list of functionally similar hashes to the provided one
actions.verbose: Provides a list of SHA1 hashes of files that are functionally similar to the provided file (SHA1 hash) at the selected precision level.

actions.description: TCA-0403 Queries URL Threat Intelligence
TCA-0404 - Analyze a given URL
actions.verbose: This service allows users to submit a URL for analysis.

actions.description: TCA-0402 - Retrieve the number of MALICIOUS, SUSPICIOUS and KNOWN files associated with a specific URI
actions.verbose: Provides the number of MALICIOUS, SUSPICIOUS and KNOWN files associated with a specific URI (domain, IP address, email or URL).

actions.description: TCA-0401 - Retrieve a list of all available file hashes associated with a given URI
actions.verbose: Provides a list of all available file hashes associated with a given URI (domain, IP address, email or URL) regardless of file classification.

actions.description: TCA-0207 - Submit an existing sample for dynamic analysis
actions.verbose: This service allows users to detonate a file in the ReversingLabs TitaniumCloud sandbox. To submit a file for analysis, it must exist in TitaniumCloud.

platform.description: Selected platform on which the analysis will be performed. See TCA-0207 API documentation for available options
platform.name: platform

actions.description: TCA-0106 - Retrieve dynamic analysis results
actions.verbose: This service allows users to retrieve dynamic analysis results for a file that was submitted for dynamic analysis.

analysis_id.description: Return only the results of this analysis
analysis_id.name: analysis_id

latest.description: Return only the latest analysis results
latest.name: latest

actions.description: TCA-0205 - Reanalyze sample
actions.verbose: This query sends a sample with the requested hash for rescanning.

actions.description: TCA-0202 - Upload file to TitaniumCloud

vault_id.description: Vault ID of file to upload
vault_id.name: vault_id

actions.description: TCA-0201 - Download a sample from TitaniumCloud and add it to the vault
